column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ n'ahendzi mu afe a otsia akron no mu
column3: bosoom a otsia du no ne da a otsia du no mu no
column8: bɛkyeer do nsera; na wɔtotoow ho akoban bɔɔ aprɔw."

column2: "Na wɔkyeer kurow no do nsera kodur ɔhen Zedekia n'afe a otsia dubiako no mu."
"Bosoom a otsia anan no mu
column3: da a otsia akron no na ɔkɔm no mu yɛɛ dzen wɔ kurow no mu
column4: nna edziban bi nnyi hɔ mma asaase no do nkorɔfo no."

column2: "Nna wotuu tu wɔ kurow no mu na mbarimba akofo no nyinara guaanee duaa mu anadwe faa afasu ebien no a ɔwɔ ɔhen no ture ho no ntamu kuropon mu ɔkwan do kɔree; (afei Kaldeafo etwa kurow no ho ehyia:) na ɔhen no faa Araba ɔkwan do kɔree."
"Naaso Kaldeafo dɔm no tsiiw ɔhen no
column3: na wɔkɔtoo no wɔ Jeriko tɛtɛr mu: na wɔbɔɔ no dɔm no nyinara fii no ho petsee."

column2: "Nna wɔkyeer ɔhen no
column3: na wɔdze no kɛmaa Babilɔnhen wɔ Ribla; na wobuaa no atsɛn."

column2: "Na wokunkum Zedekia ne mbabanyin wɔ n'enyim
column3: na wotutuu Zedekia n'enyiwa

column2: "Afei bosoom a otsia enum no mu
column3: wɔ bosoom no ne da a otsia esuon no a
column6: n'afe a otsia duakron no mu

column2: "na ɔbɛhyeew EWURADZE ne fi
column3: na ɔhen ne fi; na Jerusalɛm efi nyinara
column4: mekyerɛ efi akɛse nyinara ɔdze gya hyeew no."

column2: "Na Kaldeafo dɔm a wɔka abrafohen no ho no nyinara dwuruuw Jerusalɛm afasu no guu famu hyiae."
"Na nkorɔfo nkaa a wɔkaa kurow no mu
column3: na hɔn a wɔpaae fii Zedekia ho no kɔr Babilɔnhen nkyɛn no
column5: abrafohen Nebuzaradan faa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔree."

column2: "Na abrafohen no gyaa asaase no do ehiafo no bi dɛ wɔnyɛ wenyin tureahwɛfo na ekuafo."
"Na boran edum a ɔwɔ EWURADZE ne fie no
column3: na eguarsɛn ase ndaka na boran po a ɔwɔ EWURADZE ne fie no
column5: na wɔfaa no ho boran no kɔr Babilɔn."

column2: "Na asɛn
column3: na nsofi
column6: na boran ndzɛmba a wɔdze som no nyinara

column2: "Na ogyasɛn no
column3: na mbɛɛsen no; dza ɔyɛ sika no
column7: abrafohen no faa ne nyinara kɔree."

column2: "Edum ebien no
column3: po kor no
column4: na eguarsɛn ase ndaka a Solomon yɛe maa EWURADZE ne fie no; ndzɛmba yi nyinara ho boran no woenntum woennker."

column2: "Idum kor ne tsentsen yɛ basafa duawɔtwe
column3: na boran ntaadotsir wɔ no do: na ntaadotsir no ne tsentsen yɛ basafa ebiasa; atenadwuma na  pɔmegranate  ekutu wɔ ntaadotsir no do bɔ aprɔw
column4: ne nyinara boran a: na idum a otsia ebien no so tse dɛ iyinom

column2: "Na abrafohen no faa ɔsɔfo tsitsir Seraia
column3: na ɔsɔfo a odzi do

column2: "na kurow no mu so ɔfaa ɔpanyin a wɔdze no sii akofo no do no; na ɔhen no n'apamfo no mu mbarimba beenum a wohun hɔn wɔ kurow no mu
column3: na ɔkyerɛwfo
column4: dɔmhen a ɔpon asaase no do nkorɔfo kɔ ɔsa no; na asaase no do nkorɔfo no mu mbarimba eduosia a wohun hɔn wɔ kurow no mu no."

column2: "Na abrafohen Nebuzaradan faa hɔn
column3: na ɔdze hɔn brɛɛ Babilɔnhen wɔ Ribla."

column2: "Na Babilɔnhen bobɔɔ hɔn na okunkum hɔn wɔ Ribla wɔ Hamat asaase do. Dɛm kwan yi do na wɔfaa Judafo ndɔmmum fii hɔn asaase do kɔree."
"Na nkorɔfo a wɔkaa Juda asaase do a Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar maa wɔkae no dze
column3: mekyerɛ hɔn na ɔdze Safan ba Ahikam ne ba Gedalia dzii hɔn do ambrado."

column2: "Afei aber a dɔm no hɔn asafohemfo no nyinara
column3: hɔn na hɔn mbarimba no
column4: tsee dɛ Babilɔnhen dze Gedalia ayɛ ambrado no
column5: wɔbaa Gedalia nkyɛn wɔ Mizpa. Iyinom nye

column2: "Na Gedalia suae kyerɛɛ hɔn na hɔn mbarimba no
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Mma hom nnsuro osian Kaldeafo nkowaa no ntsi: hom ntsena asaase yi do

column2: "Naaso ɔbaa dɛ bosoom a otsia esuon no mu no
column3: nna Elisama ba Netania ne ba Ismael a ofi adehyemba no mu bae
column4: na mbarimba du ka no ho
column6: na Judafo na Kaldeafo a wɔka no ho wɔ Mizpa no so."

column2: "Na nkorɔfo no nyinara
column3: nkakraba na akɛse nyina
column4: na dɔm no hɔn asafohemfo soɛree na wɔbaa Egypt: osiandɛ wosuroo Kaldeafo no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Judahen Jehoiakin no ndɔmmumkɔ afe a otsia eduasa esuon no mu bosoom a otsia duebien no ne da a otsia eduonu esuon no
column3: nna Babilɔnhen Evil-merodak
column4: n'afe a ɔhyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ mu no mu no

column2: "na ɔkasaa ayamuyie mu kyerɛɛ no
column3: na ɔkrɔɔn n'ahengua no ma ɔkyɛɛn ahemfo a wɔka no ho wɔ Babilɔn no hɔn ahengua no."

column2: "Na ɔsakyeer n'efiadze ntar no
column3: na odzidzii wɔ n'enyim daa wɔ no nkwa nda nyinara mu."

column2: "Na dza wɔdze maa no no
column3: ofi ɔhen no hɔ na wɔdze maa no daa
